contexts.context: ...his commentary. From Mainz, Rashi went to <mark>Worms</mark> and studied there under the great goan Rabbi Isaac...
...reported, rabbi and for a long time in <mark>Worms</mark>. He probably lived in the prayer house there...
...was a Rabbi in Rothenburg, Rabbi Meir of <mark>Worms</mark> - may his memory be a blessing. An...
